en.name: SUR300 Upper Receiver
en.description: The SUR300 upper receiver is a high-quality firearm component designed for the MCX rifle. Crafted with precision and durability in mind, this upper receiver enhances the overall performance and reliability of the weapon. It features a robust construction that can withstand rigorous use in various conditions, making it ideal for both professional and recreational shooters. The SUR300 upper receiver is compatible with a range of accessories, allowing users to customize their firearm to suit their specific needs and preferences. Whether for tactical applications or sport shooting, this upper receiver is a valuable addition to any firearm enthusiast's collection.

en.name: SUR300 Medium Length Handguard
en.description: The SUR300 handguard is a high-quality firearm accessory designed for the MCX rifle. This medium-length handguard offers a perfect balance between maneuverability and stability, making it ideal for various shooting applications. Crafted from durable materials, the SUR300 handguard provides excellent heat resistance and structural integrity, ensuring reliable performance during extended use. Its modular design allows for easy attachment of accessories such as grips, lights, and lasers, enhancing the overall functionality of the firearm. The SUR300 handguard is a versatile and essential component for any MCX rifle setup, catering to both tactical and recreational shooters.

en.name: SUR300 Charging Handle
en.description: The SUR300 Charging Handle is a high-quality firearm accessory designed for the MCX rifle platform. This charging handle is engineered to provide reliable and smooth operation, allowing for quick and efficient chambering of rounds. Crafted from durable materials, the SUR300 Charging Handle offers excellent strength and longevity, ensuring it can withstand the rigors of regular use. Its ergonomic design enhances user comfort and control during operation, making it an essential component for any MCX rifle setup. The SUR300 Charging Handle is a versatile and practical addition for both tactical and recreational shooters.
